row.process:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!----------------------------------------------- Parameter validation ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.CONNECTION_PARAM_LOG : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Image" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_IMAGE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Advanced Options" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_ADV_OPTION#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** CREATE SERVICE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** CREATE SERVICE ACTION FAILED ********"
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION ! -------------------------------------Building input parameters----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_COMMAND# = STR_CAT('docker', ' &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_OPTIONS# service create ')
:IF &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAME# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SERVICE_NAME# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_COMMAND#, "--name &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# ") :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_ADV_OPTION# <> '' : SET &UC4RB_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_COMMAND#, " &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_ADV_OPTION# ") :ENDIF
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_IMAGE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_COMMAND# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_COMMAND#, "&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# ")
! LOGGING COMMAND : PRINT "EXECUTING CREATE SERVICE COMMAND: &UC4RB_COMMAND#"
! ------------------------------------------ INVOKING COMMAND LINE ------------------------------------------
output=`&UC4RB_COMMAND#` execcode=$? echo $output if [ "$execcode" -ne "0" ] then : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR exit $execcode fi
serviceid=`echo $output | awk '{sub(/ overall progress:.*/,x)}1'`
servicename=`docker &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_OPTIONS# service inspect --format "{{.Spec.Name}}" "$serviceid"`
execcode=$? if [ "$execcode" -ne "0" ] then : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR exit $execcode fi
echo "UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_ID::=$serviceid" echo "UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_NAME::=$servicename"
!------------------------------------------Check error level -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER_SWARM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@UNIX : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

row.post_process:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_NAME# = "" :SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_ID# = ""
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2)
: SWITCH &KEY# : CASE "UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_NAME" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_NAME# = "&VALUE#" : CASE "UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_ID" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_ID# = "&VALUE#" : ENDSWITCH
: ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_NAME#,,"WORKFLOW" :PUBLISH &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SVC_ID#,,"WORKFLOW"
